item.description:
While Ken Wilber has created illuminating maps of reality, he is known for saying “The map is not the territory.” How can we use Integral Theory practically, to reduce suffering in ourselves and others, and to move toward our potential? Integral Coaching is a cutting-edge methodology that brings theory to life, and challenges us to connect more fully with our experience. This Meet Up session will cultivate the holding space of the Integral community, and will allow each of us to work on a topic of our choosing. There will also be a live demonstration of coaching.

Christina Congleton is a Certified Integral Coach through New Ventures West, and principal of Axon Coaching. She has worked as an educator, and as a research assistant in brain imaging laboratories at Massachusetts General Hospital and MIT. She is a student of the Diamond Approach, the spiritual teaching and method of the Ridhwan School.
item.name: Integral Maps, Boundless Territory
